content.question: Which of the following is a limitation of the data when drawing a conclusion about the most important problem facing the country in 2017Â ?

choices.label: The results are incomplete, as only 3% of respondents were taken into account when the list was compiled.
The data were collected in a short time frame, which does not reveal full-year trends.
The data were compiled from an exit poll; therefore, the data reflect only the views of registered voters.
Respondents were presented with a list of problems from which they could choose more than one.

content.answer: The data were collected in a short time frame, which does not reveal full-year trends.
